鶂鶂鶂

鶂字的基本解释

鶂
yì
古同“鷁”。

鶂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》五歷切，入錫，疑。］
亦作“鶃1”。
(1)水鸟名。形似鸬鹚。善高飞。
(2)见“鶂鶂”。

鶂字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶂； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1493第15
【廣韻】五歷切【集韻】【韻會】倪歷切，?音艗。水鳥。雄雌相視則孕。【莊子·天運篇】鶂之相視，眸子不運而風化。【謝靈運·山居賦】鳥則鵾鴻鶂鵠。又通鷁。【史記·宋世家】六鶂退飛。【左傳】作鷁。又【集韻】研奚切，音倪。義同。又【集韻】【類篇】?逆革切，音虉。鳥名。【集韻】或作鷁?。

鶂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鶂字的起名意思

暂无。

Bei
Basic explanation of words
Bei
yì
The ancient same "鹢".
Bei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" five calendar cuts, into the tin, doubt. ]
Also known as "鶃1".
(1) The name of the waterfowl. It looks like a cormorant. Good flying high.
(2) See "Bei Bei".
Bei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶂; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1493 Page 15
[Guangyun] Five Liqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Ni Liqie,? Yinfeng. Waterfowl. Male and female are pregnant if they look at each other. [Zhuangzi·Tianyun Chapter] Bizhi looks at each other, and his eyes are unlucky and weathered. [Xie Lingyun·Shanju Fu] The bird is the swan. And pass the 鹢. 【Historical Records·Song Family】The Six Rivers retreat. [Zuo Zhuan] As a bird. Also 【Jiyun】Research Xiqie, Yin Ni. The same meaning. And [Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Reverse leather cut, sound. The name of the bird. [Ji Yun] Or as a 鹢?.
Bei
